**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 113 1.1 **Prerequisites** [Thorough Research](/Feats.aspx?ID=5954) --- You fundamentally understand everything to the point where your research can't possibly be wrong. You are permanently [quickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=89) and can use the extra action to [Recall Knowledge](/Actions.aspx?ID=2367). In addition, you gain the following benefits with Recall Knowledge.
  • Your checks to Recall Knowledge are no longer [secret](/Traits.aspx?ID=690).
  • When you Recall Knowledge, you use the outcome for one degree of success better than the result of your check.
  • If an effect (such as [Dubious Knowledge](/Feats.aspx?ID=5142)) would give you inaccurate information from your Recall Knowledge check, you know which information is inaccurate.
  • When one of your allies Recalls Knowledge and gains false information, you also know that information is inaccurate if they share it with you.
